The Ready-Made Templates category provides various common document templates with predefined fields, allowing for the quick generation of a formatted document.
I have read and accepted the terms and conditions
Want to use it offline only?

App Theme: Sets the color scheme to be used throughout the application.

Stay Logged In: Keeps your session active, eliminating the need to log in each time you open the app (this option is only enabled when logged in).

Automatic Synchronization: Automatically downloads and updates documents saved in the cloud.

Offline Mode: Disables all features that depend on the internet and automatically logs into offline mode.

Save on Export: When exporting a document, it will be saved on the home screen.
Password must contain at least 8 characters
Invalid password the password cannot contain spaces

Metadata includes information such as who created the document, when, and with which application. This information can be critical in some contexts. The metadata cleaner removes it to enhance your privacy.
The file converter allows you to convert documents between DOCX and PDF formats, and vice versa. Note: Depending on the PDF\'s formatting, the conversion to DOCX may not be perfect.
